page.title: 03Upton Magna Post Office cont
page.content: fairly busy because the post office has been shut on the Sunday.Tuesdays and the afternoons are usually very quiet.The original post office can still be seen opposite Frank Cross Drive.It is easy to identify because it has got two Brooke Bond Tea stickers in the window and a Colmans Starch sign on the wall. Mr.Oldham does the shopping for the shop on the half day. He gets the stock from a cash and carry, he picks up the shopping himself as there are no deliveries these days. They sell many papers but the most popular are The Sun, The Telegraph, and The Mail together with these popular comics and magazines; Look_in, Dandy,Beano, Woman, Womans Own and Farming Books.The old post office in Uffington has recently been rebuilt as a private house.
